item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: DIS (The Walt Disney Company) Large Disney’s ad-based streaming expansion presents growth opportunities, but potential management changes and leadership instability pose risks to its long-term strategy. LVS (Las Vegas Sands Corp.) Middle Las Vegas Sands (LVS) is poised to benefit from strong customer demand and improved visitation, although concerns regarding economic downturn and competition persist.
